pages.text: Since $(item)Steel/$ and $(item)Diamond/$ tools are locked behind $(bold)$(l:materials/alloying)Alloying/$, the $(item)Diamond Chisel/$ acts as a way to access obsidian and the $(thing)Nether/$ before having access to such materials.$(br2)$(item)Polished Diamonds/$ can be obtained by $(bold)$(l:materials/polishing)Polishing/$ $(item)Raw Diamonds/$.
